#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
void convert(ll num, vector <int> &v)
{
	while (num>0)
		v.push_back(num % 10), num /= 10;
	reverse(v.begin(), v.end());
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--)
	{
		ll n, k, sum = 0;
		int i;
		scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &k);
		for (i = 1; i<17; i++)
		{
			sum += i*(pow(10, i) - pow(10, i - 1));
			if (sum>k)
				break;
		}
		sum -= i*(pow(10, i) - pow(10, i - 1));
		int digit = i;
		k -= sum;
		ll num;
		if (k%digit)
		{
			num = k / digit + pow(10, digit - 1);
			k %= digit;
			vector <int> v;
			convert(num, v);
			printf("%d\n", v[k - 1]);
		}
		else
		{
			num = num = k / digit + pow(10, digit - 1) - 1;
			vector <int> v;
			convert(num, v);
			printf("%d\n", v[v.size()-1]);
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
